§6§lQuantifying multivariate redundancy with maximum entropy decompositions of mutual information§r

§8§oDaniel Chicharro§r

§72018§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oNew Section 4A formalizes the maximum entropy decomposition assumptions, showing for the multivariate case that the maximum entropy measures provide bounds or match the actual synergy, unique, and redundancy
measures(proofs in new Appendix). New Section 5 addresses the decomposition interpretability when some assumptions are not fulfilled, e.g. if a nonnegative decomposition cannot be constructed\u00a7r
